The Ounce › Style Guide

Style Guide

Elements

Elements are the foundation of the system. Simply using typography and color, well designed Elements can begin to express the site's personality.

  • Typography
  • Color Palette

Components

Elements are combined and modified to create components. Components are designed to serve specific functional roles within the system.

  • Article Title and Metadata
  • Bio Content
  • Bio Listing
  • Bio Title
  • Blog Post Rollup
  • Blog Post Footer Tags
  • Inline Article List
  • Inline FAQ List
  • Inline Form Fields
  • Inline Illustrated List
  • Inline Image
  • Inline Pagination
  • Inline Video
  • Landing Callout (Video or Infographic)
  • Landing Section Callout
  • Landing Feature Article
  • Landing Get Involved CTA
  • Site Footer
  • Site Header
  • Sub Navigation
  • Wall to Wall Hero Area

Templates

Based on the needs of the content, Components are arranged into specific layouts to create Templates.

  • General (with Educare content)
  • General (with Initiatives content)
  • General (with sample News article content)
  • Landing (with Get Involved content)
  • Landing (with Home page content)

This is a style guide made with Jekyll.
